title: PROJECT Phase 1 - First Strike Chaches

embed.description: Humanity is the ultimate weapon. Dive into PROJECT.

body:
I purchased the 8220Rp Bundle on the first day of this PROJECT event. 
I've recieved everything in the bundle save for the individual champion chaches, specifically Ashe, Ekko and Katarina.
I got the icons that come with the boxes, but no boxes. Hence no blueprints to use  my 250+ project cores on.
 
 It's been more than a week since, still no boxes. Blue, green or red. 
 Could only purchase a single PROJECT: Disruption cache this morning, the yellow one.
 
 Am I going to just miss out on the loading screen cards am I? 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: The triangle icons that you craft are what give you the First Strike border. Did you get that from anything?
